website_summaries.verdict: A great set for older kids who love the Toy Story movies or for slightly younger kids who want toys that look just like the movies.
pros: This 5-piece set features all the main characters from the classic Toy Story movies – Woody, Buzz, Jessie, Rex, and the aliens
Each figure stands on its own, is 3.5" tall, and looks just like the characters in the movies, so they're ideal for those who want them for display or to play with
cons: Because they are on the smaller side and a little delicate, they aren't ideal for young kids

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cake decoration
customer_reviews.text: They looked great and I had to keep them hidden because my son wanted to open and play with them right away. We used them for the cake and they looked great. All the kids wanted to play with them after.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for cakes
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my sons birthday cake. The pieces will break if you actually play with them, but as cake toppers they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cake toppers!
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect size to put on my cake. I love that they had bases so they stand on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Cabella

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my sons cake topper. They aren’t too heavy for the cake and looked super adorable
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Guarneros

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Story Cake Toppers
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect size to make adorable little cake toppers for my niece's Toy Story themed birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Wientjes

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I used these as part of a project for my sons room. They were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alsmith

customer_reviews.title: Imposters, but they get a pass.
customer_reviews.text: Used them as cake toppers for my son's second birthday. He liked them, so that's all that mattered. Faces look kinda off though 😂
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great for cake toppers!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my sons birthday cake! And after wee took them off the cake he kept playing with them - very pleased with the purchase. They are little figurines with small parts that will break off easily under a decent amount of pressure (not saying they break like porcelain, just be cautious of the fact they will most likely break at some point during use).
customer_reviews.author: Michele Moes

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: I used this set for cake toppers . Great product . Just like the ones you’d buy from the Disney store . Check out my cake on Instagram @cakesbyyvette24
customer_reviews.author: Juan salinas

customer_reviews.title: One time use
customer_reviews.text: Broke but served their purpose. We put them on my daughters cake. Broke soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My brother passed and we have a memorial for him outdoors. Got these for my mom for the memorial. Great size and very durable, they have been outside in the weather and have been doing very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Figures where nice perfect for cake decorating
customer_reviews.text: Used figures for birthday cake however the package was damaged. But figures were fine
customer_reviews.author: Julian Fife

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as depicted. Great for kids and or cake decoration. Great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Used these as cake toppers for my son’s birthday party. They were perfect! Now he uses them as little figurine toys.
customer_reviews.author: Mat

customer_reviews.title: Cake toppers
customer_reviews.text: Used for a baby shower bake I made came out perfect they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Pegie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cake topper..worth it
customer_reviews.text: I need cake topper for my son cake..I love these..there were perfect..not too small not too big..
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit for my grandsons 2nd birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Jankoviak

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable for a 3 year old but he loved them
customer_reviews.author: megan keyser

customer_reviews.title: They are a masterpieces 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I bought these figures to give it to my friend as she is in love with toy story characters, but I liked them so much so I took them for me 😂🤦🏻‍♀️ I’ll buy her another one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amoona

customer_reviews.title: Used as cake toppers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my baby shower cake and they worked out beautifully. It was just what I was looking for!

customer_reviews.title: It was great.
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my great grandson and he loved it therefore so did I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cake toppers!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cake top decorations and to play with after!

customer_reviews.title: Cake toppers!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put on top of my daughter's cakeband they were perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Best CAKE toppers ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughters cake! Not only that but they are also now her toys ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Looks so cute on his birthday cake

product_meta.title: Disney Toy Story Classic 5 Pack Figure Set Figure Sets, Standard, Model Number: 71579
product_meta.description: Size:StandardKids can relive and recreate their favorite scenes from Disney toy story film! set includes five figures approximately 3.5-Inches tall. Figures are displayed in a diorama style package. Disney figurine sets capture the magical moments and characters loved by all. Collect them all! designed for ages 3-7 years old.
feature_bullets: Kids can relive and recreate their favorite scenes from Disney toy story

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars317 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
